data.name: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack
data.detailed_description:
Test your truck driver skills with new trailers and cargoes included in Heavy Cargo Pack. Take advantage of high-tech trailers supporting steerable axles for safer navigation around tight bends. With rebalanced game physics and loads weighing in at up to 60 tons, this DLC will challenge you with all-new heavy haul duties.

New Cargoes


  • Asphalt Miller
  • Industrial Cable Reel
  • Concrete Beams
  • Crawl Dozer
  • Locomotive
  • Metal Centering
  • Mobile Crane
  • Transformer

New Trailers


  • Single Extendable Flatbed
  • Semi Lowloader with Drop Deck

data.short_description: Test your truck driver skills with new trailers and cargoes included in Heavy Cargo Pack. Take advantage of high-tech trailers supporting steerable axles for safer navigation around tight bends. With rebalanced game physics and loads weighing in at up to 60 tons, this DLC will challenge you with all-new heavy haul duties.
data.supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese, Polish, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Hungarian, Czech, Romanian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Greek

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 20 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
